text: Paul Malékou (born November 17, 1938) was the Foreign Minister of Gabon for a short time in 1968. He was born in Fougamou, Gabon. Malékou was Director- General of ASECNA from 1975 to 1983.History page at ASECNA website ."Quel patron pour l'Asecna ?", Jeune Afrique, 1 June 2004 . ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Gabonese politicians
title: Paul Malékou
